description: Elemental Classification for Building Specifications, Cost Estimating, and Cost Analysis

level1_elements.title: Substructure
level1_elements.description: All work below the first floor construction or below grade, whichever is higher

level2.title: Foundations
level2.description: Standard spread footings, pile caps, and grade beams

level2.title: Basement Construction
level2.description: Basement excavation, basement walls, and basement floors

level2.title: Superstructure
level2.description: Floor and roof construction above the first floor

level2.title: Exterior Enclosure
level2.description: Exterior walls, exterior windows, and exterior doors

level2.title: Roofing
level2.description: Roof coverings and openings

level1_elements.title: Interiors
level1_elements.description: Interior construction, interior finishes, and stair construction

level2.title: Interior Construction
level2.description: Partitions and interior doors

level2.title: Stairs
level2.description: Stair construction

level2.title: Interior Finishes
level2.description: Wall finishes, floor finishes, and ceiling finishes

level1_elements.title: Services

level2.title: Conveying
level2.description: Elevators, escalators, moving walks, lifts, material handling systems

level2.title: Plumbing
level2.description: Plumbing fixtures, domestic water distribution, sanitary waste, and rain water drainage

level2.title: HVAC
level2.description: Energy supply, heat generating systems, cooling systems, distribution systems, terminal and package units, controls and instrumentation

level2.title: Fire Protection
level2.description: Sprinklers, standpipes, fire protection specialties

level2.title: Electrical
level2.description: Electrical service and distribution, lighting and branch wiring, communications and security, other electrical systems

level1_elements.title: Equipment and Furnishings
level1_elements.description: Equipment and furnishings unique to building types

level2.title: Equipment
level2.description: Commercial equipment, institutional equipment, vehicular equipment, other equipment

level2.title: Furnishings
level2.description: Fixed furnishings, movable furnishings

level1_elements.title: Special Construction and Demolition
level1_elements.description: Special construction systems and building demolition

level2.title: Special Construction
level2.description: Special structures, integrated construction, special facilities, special controls and instrumentation

level2.title: Selective Building Demolition
level2.description: Building elements demolition, hazardous components abatement

level1_elements.title: Building Sitework
level1_elements.description: Site preparation, improvement, mechanical utilities, and electrical utilities

level2.title: Site Preparation
level2.description: Site clearing, earthwork, site dewatering, shoring and underpinning

level2.title: Site Improvements
level2.description: Roadways, parking lots, pedestrian paving, site development, landscaping

level2.description: Electrical distribution, site lighting, site communications and security

level2.description: Other site systems and equipment

level2.title: General Requirements
level2.description: Project management, field engineering, temporary facilities

level2.title: Bidding Requirements
level2.description: Procurement, bidding procedures, contracting requirements
